member.summary:
An array of required s that need to be initialized for this unlockable to be added. Types are added via
For example, Adding an UnlockableDef for an Item that can be disabled or enabled in a config file. You'd only want this unlockable to be implemented if the Item is enabled in the config file, as such, Adding a required type of the item that gets unlocked when this Unlockable is obtained means this Unlockable only gets added if the Required Type is also added.

member.summary:

You'd only want this unlockable to be implemented if the Item () is enabled in the config file, as such, Adding a required type of the item that gets unlocked when this Unlockable is obtained means this Unlockable only gets added if the Required Type is also added.

member.name: M:Moonstorm.MSUtil.InverseHyperbolicScaling(System.Single,System.Single,System.Single,System.Int32)
member.summary:
Calculates inverse hyperbolic scaling (diminishing) for the parameters passed in, and returns the result.
Uses the formula: baseValue + (maxValue - baseValue) * (1 - 1 / (1 + additionalValue * (itemCount - 1)))
Original code by KomradeSpectre
member.param: The starting value of the function.
The value that is added per additional itemCount
The maximum value that the function can possibly be.
The amount of items/stacks that increments our function.
member.returns: A float representing the inverse hyperbolic scaling of the parameters.
